LanguageData.WNA_RiteAbleting.label: rite ableting
LanguageData.WNA_RiteAbleting.description: break down slag chunks to retrieve useful things, more productive than traditional methods.
LanguageData.WNA_RiteBeastDivision.label: divide a corpse
LanguageData.WNA_RiteBeastDivision.description: divide a corpse so that it can be used for more uses.
LanguageData.WNA_RiteRebelStriving.label: break down a thing
LanguageData.WNA_RiteRebelStriving.description: break down a weapon or apparel and see if there's something can be recycled.
